website_summaries.verdict: Highly-rated handheld metal detector has a retune button to help filter out environmental factors, and operates up to 10 feet under water.
pros: Retune button calibrates detector to tune out environmental factors, and narrows detection parameters
Safety orange color enhances visibility underwater and in low-light situations
Strong ability to detect small targets and nuggets
Pinpointer feature sounds alarm if detector is left on but unattended
Works best for objects up to 2 or 3 feet away
cons: Some users experienced pressure issues when submerging unit

customer_reviews.title: Received a fake one, bogus serial number.
customer_reviews.text: Pointer received has a serial number that starts with 5623, bogus number fake not real
customer_reviews.author: Joe Smith

customer_reviews.title: Superior product
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first 60 days. Then sound started to fade and detection of items has become less and less accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Laura W

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it! It is well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Best pinpointer and I have owned quite a few. I also own an older Black version that is still going strong. It does take a bit of getting used to because there are more modes on "the carrot" but by far the best. The best thing is this comes with a 2 year warranty and even when I broke my black pinpointer and I told them it was my fault and would be glad to pay, they said send it back and was repaired no charge. Garrett customer service is great.
customer_reviews.author: Cactus Jack

customer_reviews.title: Not SaltWater proof!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not saltwater proof-! I got mine took to the beach - 2feet of saltwater- worked for a while- then quit working and tried drying it out - no function! Now I have to ship it back!!!!ugh! Not happy Garrett!
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Adler

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this it does not work
customer_reviews.text: So very disappointed. Does not pick up steel shot that is in goose breast let alone when a pellet was visibly showing. Waste of $127.46.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Poor very poor. Paid for a New Garrett Pro-pointer At and recieved the item and the box is opened and it’s scratched up where it’s been used and dirt in the battery holder and the light on it doesn’t even work. I wouldn’t recommend buying. Paying $127 for used product.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley B

customer_reviews.title: Once you set your settings unit easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This really helps to pinpoint items. Once you set your settings unit easy to use. Changing settings not very intuitive
customer_reviews.author: M Benner

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how pleased I am with this thing. If you do a lot of metal detect in this thing is I must have it cuts your time sitting there dirt in more than half. Has a built-in flashlight several settings and a silent mode. Is waterproof and has a ruler thought of it to measure how deep your hole is. And had a little scraper on the side. Also features a alarm setting in case it gets lost it will trip for 60 minutes so you can find it. Brightly colored and waterproof. By far the best investment you can make metal detecting.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Uses a 9 volt battery not the stated 3 AA's.
customer_reviews.text: It came with a 9 volt battery in the unit. The box looks like a used returned item. I boght this as a gift and it looks used.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lamfers

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality, made in the USA... don't settle for imitators!
customer_reviews.text: I made the typical beginner mistake of buying the cheap (read: nowhere near as good) no-name version of this pinpointer. Just because it's orange and shaped the same doesn't mean it's any good. Anyway, I learned... and couldn't be happier with the Pro-Pointer AT. The single word that comes to mind is QUALITY. Features: - Configurable (3 sensitivity levels, each with or without sound) - Ground balancing / retune - Bright LED - Waterproof - Periodic beeps if you leave it on, making it easy to find if you lose sight of it - Molded measurements - Low-battery warning - Loop for a lanyard (not included)
customer_reviews.author: Rock Roberge

customer_reviews.title: Works so much better than my other pinpointers.
customer_reviews.text: The Garrett pinpointers have a reputation of being the best and they are. I have two other pinpointers. One is a counterfeit Garrett pinpointer that I bought on Craigslist. It looked exactly alike. When I tried to use it I couldn't change the settings. It was weak and had one setting instead of six. I called Garrett and they showed me how to tell a counterfeit from a real one. There is also youtube video's on how to tell a fake from a real one. The other pinpointer was larger and heaver and the vibration sometimes would not stop once it started. Drove my wife nuts. The moral is buy new and only from a reputable dealer.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fig.

customer_reviews.title: Great pinpointer, but...
customer_reviews.text: Great pinpointer, but will drain a 9V quickly - so bring extra batteries. I bought some rechargeable ones on amazon, and they've been working great so far. And don't leave the battery in the propointer when not in use for a few hours, as it still seems to drain the battery even when it's off. Also, this thing will really mess with a PI detector, so take off your headphones when pinpointing. Doesn't cause any signal interference with VLF - other than the metal in the pinpointer itself.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you're into metal detecting, even casually, you owe it to yourself to also carry one of these little gems. To say it's only a pin-pointer is selling it short. The light illuminates those grungy little area you're searching in. The ruler helps determine if you've gone deep enough. When you tire of the beeping, you can switch to the vibration mode. And you'll perk up with excitement when you spot one of these "carrots" on TV shows like Oak Island, and Expedition Unknown.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Stevens

customer_reviews.title: but has a feature to reset the sensitivity with just a single button press that makes narrowing down your hunt super easy. The unit is definitely waterproof and not ...
customer_reviews.text: High quality build with features that work well. It is sensitive to find small metal objects (small as a bb) from a few inches away, but has a feature to reset the sensitivity with just a single button press that makes narrowing down your hunt super easy. The unit is definitely waterproof and not just water resistant. I also appreciate the option to choose vibration and/or sound for the alert. This is worth it! especially if you are metal detecting it will save lots of frustration, allowing you to quickly locate your find in the ground.
customer_reviews.author: J R

customer_reviews.title: Garrett Pro-Pointer AT
customer_reviews.text: The "Garrett Carrrot" is an extremely well made product, and is a very popular pinpointer in use. It is a huge help when metal detecting. The unit is completely sealed, so water is not a problem. The orange color makes it easy to spot if you leave it in the grass. It comes with a very good quality holster, but not a carabiner or cord to attach it to a belt or vest. Really hard to go wrong with this pinpointer!
customer_reviews.author: Wyrmwood

customer_reviews.title: Just spend the money for a Garrett - it’s worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was fortunate to compare this handheld side by side with a friend who had a less expensive brand. The Garrett was so noticeably better he quit using his. There were round balls his would not pick up that this one would with ease from two inches. You won’t go wrong getting a Garrett, and this company’s service is world class. Completely water resident, but not necessarily mud resistant so make sure you clean it out good or mud will cake over the speaker on the inside and make it not as loud.
customer_reviews.author: ColtsPop

customer_reviews.title: None Better !
customer_reviews.text: The garrett pin pointer is bar none the best on the market. High quality, and works perfect everytime. Don't try to buy any of the knock offs, this is the pinpointer every metal dectorists needs to use. This is the second one I bought, only because I lost my first one ( dumb mistke on my part ). Has an excellent range, the battery lasts forever, and it helps me locate my target real quick. It is waterproof up to 10 feet, there is a little bright led ligt that runs down the pointer, this has come in handy a few times, during the low light digs at dusk. Comes with a woven belt holster, and a 9-volt battery.
customer_reviews.author: Dave's Tech

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: This tool is awesome, it will save you lots of time and effort. Much better than the cheaper ones I bought as they tended to detect in every direction equally. It literally is a pin pointer, it gets you on the item quickly once in the hole (sometimes even through dirt before digging once you have a location with your main detector). After you dig a little this also helps you find the item in the dirt you removed quickly to keep you from digging more than you need to. I have had it a year or more and I am still glad I bought it every time I use it, time is precious and this thing saves it!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love this guy, just wish it could go a bit deeper.
customer_reviews.text: This a great pin pointer especially when you are working a spot on land. But in the water it is not ideal for what most divers would need. Other products and full-sized detectors do up to 250. If this did even 50 that would be great. I don't see why it cant because it is essentially a flashlight and i have several lights that do 250. If you are shallow water or over land and want something durable, this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alan W.

customer_reviews.title: JUST Fantastic to use!
customer_reviews.text: This review is about a year past due, However, I appreciate more the reviews after items like this have been in the trenches. That being said The "Carrot" Far exceeded my expectations! It is actually water proof after full immersion into the water! (Last one I bought dies after water hit the power button-NO it was not a garret) Spend the money, buy from here and you will not be disappointed, DO NOT BUY COPYCATS to this device, you WILL regret it when you are searching for that gem and it stops working!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great pinpointer. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Definitely worth the price. I've tried two different cheaper pinpointers, and they worked okay, but it was taking me way longer to pinpoint deeper finds than some of the others in my group who had the Garrett Pro-Pointer AT. Testing them side by side we found that the Garrett has a better range, it would pick up the target from farther away so you know right away which direction to dig deeper in without wasting any time deepening the entire hole like with the cheaper pinpointers where I had to dig down pretty close to the target before it would pick anything up.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Quality Garrett product.
customer_reviews.text: I've been in rivers with this all over Georgia, and this has never had any problems. I wear a snorkel and dive around rocks in rivers to find stuff that tubers/river foaters drop in the river. Max depth I've gone is about 6 feet and this has never had any problems. 3 types of sensitivity, and it vibrates and emits light through the LED. Worth the $ in my opinion. Pretty good battery life too! Garrett is quality!
customer_reviews.author: Mister Freeze

customer_reviews.title: 6 stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I was doing without this. I didn't realize how bad I needed a pinpointer in my life until I ordered this product. It drastically cut my time between identifying a targat and retrieving it. I'm really looking forward to using it underwater and stuff. The LED flashlight feature is more than adequate at low light situations and even into the dark. I even found my cats RFID identification chip with it much to my wife chagrin. If I could I would give it six stars!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bass lover 650

customer_reviews.title: Best in class
customer_reviews.text: The only way this thing will get better is if it starts digging for me and brews coffee. Simple operation, rugged without being awkward, easy to see, hard to lose. Silent vibrate feature means you won't make a spectacle of yourself becoming the Indiana Jones of pull tabs.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.  No more wasted time.
customer_reviews.text: If you do any metal detecting your life will be changes with one of these. Our metal detector gave too much of a wide area for a possible target. Lots of wasted time and dirt. Then we got this - wow. You dig a shovel full of dirt. Point this at the dirt you dug and the hole on the ground. It will tell you right away where it is. It pinpoints exactly where your target it.
customer_reviews.author: S Vegors

customer_reviews.title: i continued to use it thinking there was a learning curb but it got worse, even had trouble shutting it off
customer_reviews.text: After three weeks of using it started beeping nonstop no matter where i pointed it. I tried a new battery with no success, i continued to use it thinking there was a learning curb but it got worse, even had trouble shutting it off. By this time it is to late to return but it has a two year warranty on it. Every link I click on for help sends me right back where I started. Contact seller link doesn't work for me, keeps sending me back to same place. I need help with getting it replaced or fixed. Thanks, very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Robert Simmons

customer_reviews.title: A must have unless you want to waste time sifting dirt and digging more than you need!
customer_reviews.text: A must have for anyone using a metal detector. High quality and can go under water. Cuts search time in half once hole is dug. Even if your unit has built in pin pointer, you will want this to get down in the hole and find the artifact. If you buy a metal detector, don't waste time deciding if you need one of these,....you do! I will ask the seller to please send me a new 9v battery. The one in the unit was dead and had to replace it. I guess it sat on shelf a while a vendors location and battery went dead.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Feeback

customer_reviews.title: but it is great! I have an Ace 250 metal detector
customer_reviews.text: I'm not going to go on too much about this thing, but it is great! I have an Ace 250 metal detector. All I can say is use the detector and it's pinpoint function to localize the Target. Then check the area with the pro pointer. If you don't get a signal, just dig down a little bit, then use the pro pointer again. Check all the dirt clods you dig out of the hole. The pro pointer we'll just save you so much time! I just want to my third detecting trip and found over 20 clad coins in 3 hours! Happy Hunting!
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: A great product.
customer_reviews.text: The Garrett pinpointers are well made and work great. I upgraded from an older Garrett that did not have the adjustable sensitivity. The only improvement I would like to see is an easier way to change the sensitivity. It isn't bad the way it is but it could be made easier. I have not tried it under water. I would definitely recommend this to someone looking to upgrade or buying a first one.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Helps narrow down where the metal is!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is an avid metal detector and loves to go out and metal detect and also loves going to the river to look around, this product was awesome in helping him pinpoint where the item was once his detector told him the general area. This is also great that it is water proof and comes with a handy case for carrying, definitely would recommend this product to anyone looking to make their metal detecting experience easier or for water adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I use a Garrett Ace 350 for metal detecting on the beach. The pinpoint feature of the Ace 350 gets me pretty close to items under the sand. Then I use the Pro-Pointer to zero into the target and criss-cross until I have almost the exact location. Using the Pro-Pointer means less searching and sifting and faster finding with less sifting.
customer_reviews.author: JohnB

customer_reviews.title: ... this for my little girl and it is freakin AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my little girl and it is freakin AWESOME!!! I paired this with an ACE 400 and she’s finding targets all of the time. This pin pointer has made her digging MUCH easier. It’s super sensitive and works well in water too. It was not cheap, but high quality never is and this is very high quality! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mista Rooaz

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves this new toy!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves this little pointer! Almost too much! He likes to go around the house on Saturday mornings, and point it at EVERYTHING metal in the house!! So it will wake everyone up?! Really? That's not why you purchased it, right?? Ha!🤦🏼‍♀️🤦🏼‍♀️😉
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: It works on gold and silver!
customer_reviews.text: I was wanting a pinpointer that was capable of locating ALL metals, not just iron bearing ones. I tested the one I received on a quarter from 1934 and my wife's gold wedding ring...both were detected. I even tested a very small piece of copper wire and it sounded off ! The color of the pinpointer and the waterproof quality is a plus, especially if searching in mud or shallow water. I especially like the 6 settings (3 sensitivities with sound and 3 without sound) Now if I can just make up my mind on the metal detector to get I will be ready to do some treasure hunting...
customer_reviews.author: Packrat

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I do love the Garrett Pro Pointer. Rugged, accurate, and reliable... as can be seen imitations abound... just shows how good it is. Do wish they could do some updates and add a button or two to help function selections. I'd also like a brighter LED light with brightness control... doubling as a minimal emergency flashlight could be useful.
customer_reviews.author: Albert G. Giguere Jr

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra $
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought a cheap knock off for $40, after missing several targets I decided to go ahead and purchase the Garrett. Absolutely an incredible difference. Top notch quality, easy to use, and definitely worth the extra cost. Don't mess around with the knockoffs, you won't be sorry for purchasing the Garrett. In some areas I've had to turn it down it was so sensitive. Even on the lower sensitivity the Garrett picks up targets the others would miss. I like being able to adjust the sensitivity and also the mute function. Like all of their products, this is a great one and well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pointer.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pointer, very accurate, waterproof up to 20 ft. I bought the GP pointer before this Garrett because of a few YouTube videos that said it was better but I don’t think they used fresh batteries in the videos , no comparison. Garrett goes a few inches deeper and a much better product.. You get what you pay for. Also received in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Markel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect As Always
customer_reviews.text: Anyone looking to get this already knows about it or has read about it elsehwere. I prefer it over many others due to the vibrate function. I do a lot of night searching and don't like noise that isn't coming through my headphones. The orange color makes it easy to find if you drop it or leave it behind.
customer_reviews.author: Tom O

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tool not for pinpointing artifacts but to find pockets of gold underwater. The device works because there is normally lead or iron mixed with the gold I find in underwater crevices. I am using this tool for something it is not designed for i believe. Has worked for the three years I have owned it. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Meisberger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pinpointer!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my Minelab with this Pinpointer and I was very impressed. I love the different settings and it picks up so much more. The only drawback I have found is that it picks up better on its side than at the point. By watching a few YouTube videos I learned a couple of tricks and wouldn’t go back.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Ennis

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and compact. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Has varying levels of sensitivity that indicate in both normal and silent modes. I use it for finding gopher traps. Generally I'm within 10" of where I know there to be a trap, but maybe a coyote has shredded the set so I can't exactly tell where I placed things. With the sensitivity in the middle range, it does the job in all soils. It gets wet, sandy, muddy, and rattles around in a bucket of heavy gear every day of the year. Holds up great. Battery life with the 9V has been about 10 months of intermittent use on a weekly basis. Quite happy with it. Saves time digging around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Companion to Ace 350
customer_reviews.text: Pro's: Effective pinpointing, small and compact. Con's: it gets a bit quirky as it switches from one mode to another (silent/vibrate to signal noise/vibrate). Make sure you read the page in the manual that shiws you how to change modes. Overall i am very pleased and it's a good companion to my garret ace 350.
customer_reviews.author: Kubes

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without
customer_reviews.text: Just got back into detecting and I have used this unit before. It is absolutely an essential pinpointer for the field. I will refuse to hunt without one. It is waterproof, sound on/off, and is always accurate in recovery. I am a minelab user in terms of detectors, but I will be using this pinpointer for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Stuetzel

customer_reviews.title: It spoils you!
customer_reviews.text: I invested in this even though it cost twice as much as my metal detector. It's great! Now I could never metal detect without a pin pointer again. It really spoils you. Just get one!
customer_reviews.author: rollingblubber

customer_reviews.title: If you metal detect and DON'T have one of these, you got problems.
customer_reviews.text: After hunting 2 days without one of these it was extremely frustrating not finding my targets. After all the videos I seen I caved in and bought it, first day out I found about 20 things in the ground within 30 seconds of each hit. Truly a game changer and a MUST HAVE for every person that does metal detecting.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Baker

customer_reviews.title: Don’t go metal detecting without one!
customer_reviews.text: This pin pointer works great! I love that you can ground balance it, and adjust the sensitivity without even looking at it. The orange is great as the black is easier to loose. I haven’t tested the water proof-ness... But given everyone else that uses them in the water, I don’t foresee any issues. Would love this with Bluetooth to work with my non-Garrett headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher B.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you know why you are purchasing it
customer_reviews.text: If you are buying this to find a lost piece of metal in a pile of mud.. than maybe it's good.. But if you buy this to skim through thick carpet looking for an expensive piece of jewelry than forget it. I bought it for that reason and despite the very small area I needed to look through the tool was useless.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Varbedian

customer_reviews.title: The Garrett CARROT5
customer_reviews.text: I have used many pin pointer's however decided to invest a little more money in one and I have to admit that I wish that I would've done this a long time ago. This thing is is better than any pin pointer I ever had. Don't go for the cheap ones... it will lead you on a wild goose chase... Enjoy your time Metal detecting and get you a good pin pointer... This one
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Fitness

customer_reviews.title: This made metal detecting fun!
customer_reviews.text: First time out we found a silver liberty quarter in the dirt. Of course, someone had put a round through it, so it's not worth anything, but the pinpointer made the find much easier. If you like metal detecting and are tired of trying to find little things in a shovelful of dirt, this will do the trick!
customer_reviews.author: rider237

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Plenty of features. Seems durable.
customer_reviews.text: The pointer works fine, but it looks like it may have been used a little and then returned- like I am the second owner. I suspected this upon initial examination, but the dead battery the first time out somewhat confirmed my feelings. No biggie though, I'll still use it until I lose it or it breaks. Easy to use. Plenty of features. Seems durable (I bet I can still break it).
customer_reviews.author: B. LeMeilleur

customer_reviews.title: Counterfit
customer_reviews.text: The item I received is counter fit. I bought this Garrett Pin pointer from this vender on April 9th 2018. It never worked right. It looked real! I never thought it was a fake, I used reviews as my guide as well as Amazon recommends in purchasing. I came to find out by a you tube video that the one I have is counter fit. If the serial number just rubs off with your thumb than it is counter fit. I want to replace it with an original, but my return date has long passed.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Frost

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for Reclaimed Lumber
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for finding metal in reclaimed barn and farm house lumber. I was simply awed by how effectively this device finds metal I would NEVER find. It is worth its price in simply the planer and saw blades that I saved. And it covers a very wide swath. HIGHLY recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Geppetto

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pinpointer and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my fiancé because he recently picked up metal detecting as a hobby. It is easy to use and very durable. We have not had any issues since we have used it. It is spot on and makes finding an object after locating it with the metal detector an ease.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Jane

customer_reviews.title: This thing worked for about a month. Then it ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked for about a month. Then it worked for about 30 minutes and went into a continuous beep and vibrate which would only quit when I shut if off. Thereafter, it would only continuously beep and vibrate and shut off. I will contact Garrett for a solution.
customer_reviews.author: rockman

customer_reviews.title: I ALWAYS have it with me!!! The BEST.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product and absolute must have for anyone interested in metal detecting! This is my forth Garret metal detector and one that I never leave home without! The Pro Pointer AT is accurate, easy to use, and fits right in my purse (like I said, I NEVER leave home without it!!) I have found all sorts of interesting (and valuable!) items using it - coins, old belt buckles & buttons, rings, etc - and it has cut down my search time and digging dramatically! This is the best hand metal detector, and well worth every penny !!
customer_reviews.author: Blair Benjamin Rackham

customer_reviews.title: Extra depth and waterproof.  Its a winner.
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the black pinpointers Garrett makes. I really like the extra depth.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Great Pinpointer
customer_reviews.text: Haven't been metal detecting very long but recently got to try this out in the Watauga River near Boone NC. Freezing cold water and it worked perfect! Didn't find anything great but was able to detect small pieces of metal in fast flowing water. Highly recommend in accompanying your metal detector!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: This is a must need for any metal detector !!
customer_reviews.text: This product is completely water submersible and is a must need for any metal detector it makes locating targets so much easier you can adjust sensitivity and it even has a little LED light on the front comes with holster also !!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Don't cheap out on the pointer....
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would go cheap the 1st round and the Chinese knock off lasted a solid 9 months. I then bucked up and got the Garrett. Man did I make a mistake the 1st time. The Garrett is light years better than any cheap brand. Don't make the same mistake I did. Pony up the price difference. You will be very glad you did, trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pro-Pointer addition to treasure hunting
customer_reviews.text: Sweet device! Years of digging, re-evalutating a hole, probing with frustration where I thought a treasure should be in a search spot, only to waist more precious time. Well, this excellent item gets me right to my target. I've owned a nice Garrett metal detector for over ten years, and this Pro-pointer is the icing on the cake when out and about. I recommend spending the higher dollar for this item. The company has proven itself for many years as only a quality manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Bob W.

customer_reviews.title: You can not beat these pin pointers for quality, ...
customer_reviews.text: You can not beat these pin pointers for quality , adjustability or durability. This is my second one. (extra) I have several other brands of pin pointers but they do not get used anymore. The garrett all terrain pin pointers are well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This pinpointer failed the first day I took it out ...
customer_reviews.text: This pinpointer failed the first day I took it out I didn't use it more than 15 minutes and the audio went out on it, now it only vibrates usually Garrett's products are top notch But I reluctantly gave this two stars and I feal I was being generous i've learned my lesson about buying these online
customer_reviews.author: Todd butler

customer_reviews.title: Saves a lot of time.
customer_reviews.text: I Love it. I bought a cheaper pointer first (different brand). I wasn't satisfied so I spent the money on this one. What a huge difference. Picks up signals from 3-6 inches away. I'm seriously considering on buying another one for my 14 year old son, who happens to be my "Dirt-surfing" partner.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Works great, keeps teenager interested and outside
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 15 year old son..he took it out immediatly to the park..got him off the computer i am happy..first find was a beer can 2 inches deep in dirt..works great, easy to use and gets kids out of the house big plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very high sensitivity with one touch ground balance!
customer_reviews.text: This device has changed my digs! No more giant hole searching for a pop tab! I pulled $1.26 in change from a spot I thought I'd hunted out! The silent mode is a great thing in public areas, It prevents people from immediately wandering over to see what you've found. The highest sensitivity makes this thing a great stand alone if you decide to do a quick check under swingsets and slides at the park with your kids. waterproof means you can rinse it off after a dig.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: This pinpointer works great
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find anything before I got this. Detector would go off and couldn't find what set it off. Now I find the smallest items. New to this so the sensitivity needs to be adjusted on the detector. Haven't found anything of real value but it's fun trying.
customer_reviews.author: GLV

customer_reviews.title: More features than you realize at first
customer_reviews.text: Love it! As a newbie that was using the alternative 30$ knock-off, only took a few weeks to buy the Garrett and compare. Wow. Big difference in sensitivities. Garrett wins hands down on features and sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: Fellowhawk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pointer
customer_reviews.text: I have used this pointer a lot since I got it. It works really well and helps immensely in finding even the smallest of artifact in the soil. It's worth the money for sure . . . makes metal detecting much more fun and productive.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: It really works well...
customer_reviews.text: It really is as good as everybody says it is! I love my Garrett Pointer, I’ve already tested it by locating the chip on my dog and a couple of steel shot in some grouse that we shot. Happy Happy Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: THE GARRETT POINTER ALWAYS TELLS THE TRUTH
customer_reviews.text: The Garrett Pointer is an absolute must. It will never lie to you. If it is telling you something is there, I can assure you, something is there. It makes searching so much faster, easier, and fun. It's worth every penny you pay for it. And yes I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: anthony williams

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Only issue
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Only issue, got some mud in behind the power button, cleaned it out and now it doesn't work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: This thing cuts digging around in the soil and reswiping ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing cuts digging around in the soil and reswiping with the metal detector over and over second guessing yourself to get in and get out. It really is a must have. Very accurate once detected and pin pointing. I don't review products very often but this one deserves it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this for a few days and have already found three quarters buried in my back yard, along with the obligatory pull tabs and nails of course. I am brand new to metal detecting and am looking forward to hitting the beach soon with this pointer and my Garrett AT Pro! Update: I have been using this for two months on land, lake, river, and beach. I really like this pointer!
customer_reviews.author: MSgt Rick

customer_reviews.title: Love Reclaimed Wood?
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband. He uses in construction. He says it more better that the detectors for construction by being small and compact. Its like having a screwdriver in his tool pouch. He says the guys are always borrowing it. May get more to give away. WHO WOULD A THOUGHT! For bigger scans he has the "Lumber Wizard 4"
customer_reviews.author: pamela plouhar

customer_reviews.title: Don't leave home without it!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. Makes locating your target so much quicker. Won't go detecting without it. The fact that it detects targets to the side of the Pinpointer as well as in front of the tip, does make it a little confusing at first. With just a little time and practice, this becomes a non-issue. Would strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Customer

customer_reviews.title: Priced Right for excellent quality product "Garrett" produces.
customer_reviews.text: We received the Garrett with no delays, very quickly, less then a week. It appears to work great, we tested in the house on different items. It has features we didn't expect and both my husband and I really like. I have not tried underwater so I can say yet but it's a Garrett, I have know doubt it is exactly as they stated. Amazon has cheaper pin pointers but you pay for what you get! Garrett's is one of the top dawg's in metal detectors and accessories for a reason and that's quality. I give them..... 5 STARS!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Harris

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This worked great! I found a college ring, two 14k gold necklaces, a few phones, and a ton of junk with this thing. I used it diving in 10 ft or less of near 0 visibility water with a gravel or silt bottom. It worked great! The vibration setting really helped.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was very nervous while waiting for it to arrive after reading about knockoffs. Mine beeps twice, has a battery, etc. The real deal and made detecting a thousand times more efficient.
customer_reviews.author: amsd2dth

customer_reviews.title: Took a little to get used to but works fine. The stitching on the holster strap (belt loop) ...
customer_reviews.text: Took a little to get used to but works fine. The stitching on the holster strap (belt loop) was poorly done and gave out the first hour I used it. I repaired it much better than when it was new. works fine now. For 127.00 you think they could afford to rivet the belt loop. Just a suggestion. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad. Will be returning
customer_reviews.text: It eats batteries. Bad. Will be returning. Good sensitivity. Ergonomic. But when you spend half the cost on batteries in a month something is wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW....I can find stuff now
customer_reviews.text: How many hours did I waste sifting through dirt only to "NOT" find what the metal detector showed to be there.....also a Garrett....this little device is awesome and helps to find those dirt covered items that look like a piece of clay.....biggest like is the fact it saves time looking for items lots of time this item makes finding/pinpointing an items great
customer_reviews.author: Laura H.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad who loves to take his metal detector out as a hobbit. He has raved about this since he’s received it, said it is very accurate and helps with his searches immensely, recommends anyone who has a detector to get this!
customer_reviews.author: Erinlazgrant

customer_reviews.title: just got it seems to work great, have been using the GP pinpointer it stopped ...
customer_reviews.text: just got it seems to work great, have been using the GP pinpointer it stopped working after 4 months. Tested the carrot and got 2 1\2in on a dime in the ground that is a lot better than the 1\2in with the other cheap models. This pinpointer is easy to use and the directions that come with it are very clear. FYI don't go by the air tests you see on videos to make a choice of what to buy on any detector. {air test at propointer 3in on nickle} {ground test 2 5\8} Depending on your ground
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: 100% worth it
customer_reviews.text: Almost a necessity now when it comes to searching. I never used one until my friend had one...now I can't go detecting without it! If you detect a lot, it will pay itself in a few weeks/months
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool !
customer_reviews.text: Used a " discount " pin pointer that began to malfunction not long after i bought it... The Garrett is the Top of the line and has been a great tool to bring on each " Hunt " !
customer_reviews.author: linette

customer_reviews.title: It works really fine tune
customer_reviews.text: I give it a 5 and accuracy just cuz you actually have to be right on top of it perfectly like within a penny with but that's also the flaw but that's why it's the second tool you use besides the big metal detector
customer_reviews.author: Michael curran

customer_reviews.title: Accurate b4 digging hole.
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed this tool and cut my time looking for metal object even before I dug the hole. But, only able to use in half dozen times, because someone stole it when I was not looking. Hope they enjoy it as much as I did!
customer_reviews.author: JustAGirl83

customer_reviews.title: In the end you will buy one of these
customer_reviews.text: Garrett never disappoints. I bought a cheaper model at first and wished I shelled out the money in the beginning. You need a good reliable pointer that is 100% waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Greyalienmulder

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed at first
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed at first. I was always going through all 6 sensitivitys and that was a pain. I reread the manual and found out that it only takes a quick press of the button while the detector is actively detecting to lower the sensitivity. Now I'm a happy treasure searcher.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A.

customer_reviews.title: A must-have!!
customer_reviews.text: detecting would be nearly impossible without this. saves allot of time. highly recommend worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: S brown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love the Garrett carrot. It is a must have for metal detecting. I pinpointed several coins in muddy digs that I would have missed without it. Used it to find a screw dropped is the grass. Found that it can pick up rebar in concrete. It finds studs, pipes and wires in walls. Fairly precise with a little practice but note it doesn't discriminate only detects.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Like it so much battery life is good water resistant when it feel some metal below water start to shake and produce sound it's amazing Love it
customer_reviews.author: Dusan T.

customer_reviews.title: An essential piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Great for finding small hidden ferrous and non ferrous metals , sensitivity adjustment can be set to expose large metals to mildly hot rocks. Once the approximate location has been discovered the actual target can be quickly revealed with ease. Gives both audio and vibration signals in the presence of metal, the signals change progressively as the target gets closer for easy guidance. A light is a handy feature for use inside deep holes, dark mines or caves.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Costard

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the metal detector
customer_reviews.text: Works great and speeds things up trying to locate items. Worth the money but is a little expensive. You will not regret the purchase
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: A MUST FOR METAL DETECTING!
customer_reviews.text: A great product, and a must for metal detecting! I have only had this one for a week or so, but lost my original which I had for a couple of years. Never any issues with the first one, so hopefully this one will be as good, and hopefully I will not loose this one!
customer_reviews.author: Larry L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This pin pointer is so much better than my old Garret pointer. It is so sensitive and you can hear the sound and vibration so much better than the old one. It is a little pricey but well worth the money. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: Our grandsons loved these. So did their dad. look out boys. I like that they re water proof to 20 ft. Probably never have them down that far. I didn't get to try them. I'm sure the boys will let me know later.
customer_reviews.author: mole

customer_reviews.title: Great pin pointer with adjustable sensitivity and waterproof design
customer_reviews.text: The one-touch sensitivity adjustment is a very convenient feature. It makes it easy to use in a variety of wet and dry soils with large or small targets.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: A definite 4 or 5 star
customer_reviews.text: After buying and using one I can see why others like the Garrett AT model pointer. It is a five star to me. Anyone ranking lower than 4 star must be immature in rating products. This thing is like seen on Youtube, sounds off many inches away from target. It shows its power in picking up targets. A nice on to have, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get a chance to use it for an actual hunt yet but while we were camping my sister in law dropped a sewing needle she uses for needle point and my younger son used the pinpointer to find it among dirt, leaves, and pine needles. Worked like it's supposed to!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

product_meta.title: Garrett 1140900 Pro-Pointer AT Waterproof Pinpointing Metal Detector, Orange
product_meta.description:
Color:OrangeThe Pro-Pointer AT provides all terrain versatility for locating and pinpointing metallic targets. It is environmentally protected from the elements and is fully submersible to a maximum depth of 10 feet or 3 meters.

Pro-Pointer AT Unique Features:

Fully waterproof to 10 feet with orange color for added visibility underwater.
Maximum Sensitivity for improved detection of nuggets and other small targets. Choose from three Sensitivity levels.
Fast Retune: Quick button press instantly tunes out environment or narrows detection field for precise pinpointing of larger targets.
Retuning allows user to quickly:
Shrink detection field to precisely pinpoint large targets
Tune out mineralized ground, wet beach sand, etc.
Help gauge target size/distance
Help identify edges of large target
Pinpoint multiple targets versus one large target signal
Lost Pro-Pointer Alarm: After 5 minutes with no button presses, the pinpointer emits periodic warning chirps.
Automatic power off after 60 minutes of warning chirps; saves batteries.
Simple, single-button operation for Power, Retune, Sensitivity adjustment, and Stealth Mode.
Ruler in Inches and Centimeters molded into side of pinpointer to judge target depth.
Lanyard Attachment Loop molded into side of pinpointer.
New power button is easy to operate even with gloves.

Other Pro-Pointer AT Features:

Patented Proportional Audio/Vibration
Patented scraping blade for searching soil
Twice the battery life of other pinpointers with LED lights.
Pinpointing tip and 360° detection area
LED Flashlight for low light uses.
Includes woven belt holster
feature_bullets: Fully waterproof to 10 feet with orange color for added visibility underwater
Maximum Sensitivity for improved detection of nuggets and other small targets. Choose from three Sensitivity levels
Fast Retune: Quick button press instantly tunes out environment or narrows detection field for precise pinpointing of larger targets
